heading: Large deviation estimates for exceedance times of branching process in random environment
text:
Dariusz BURACZEWSKI University Wrocław, PolandPiotr DYSZEWSKI University Wrocław, Poland, E-mail:
pdysz@math.uni.wroc.plWe concentrate population growth process 
reproduction law randomly picked generation. Denote 
\(\mathcal{Q}=\{ Q_n \}_{n \geq 0}\) sequence iid random measures 
set nonegative integers \(\mathbb{N}\). sequence
\(\{Z_n\}_{n \geq 0}\) called  branching process random environment
\(Z_0 =1\), \[Z_{n+1} {=} \sum_{k=1}^{Z_n} \xi^n_k,\] given
\(\mathcal{Q}\), \(\xi^n_k\) iid independent \(Z_n\) common
distribution \(Q_n\). first goal establish  precise large
deviation estimates, . e. find precise asymptotic 
\[\mathbb{P}[Z_n > e^{\rho n}] \quad \mbox{} \quad n \\infty,\]
\(\rho >0\) fixed parameter. investigation 
techniques reveals apart form knowing probability large
deviations \(\{Z_n\}_{n \geq 0}\), can also point moment
arises. precisely, consider exceedance time (
first passage time) \(\{Z_n\}_{n\geq 0}\) defined viz.
\[T_t = \inf \{ n \geq 0 \: | \: Z_n>t  \}.\] study large
deviations \(\{T_t\}_{t \geq 0}\) describe probability 
\(\{Z_n\}_{n \geq 0}\) exceeds threshold \(t\) precisely given
moment, find asymptotic 
\[\mathbb{P}\left[T_t = \left\lfloor\frac{\log(t)}{\rho} \right\rfloor\right] \quad \mbox{} \quad t \\infty,\]
\(\rho >0\) fixed parameter.
